column5: I planning a trip next June for 5/6 guys. Wonder about Grace Lake out of Little Beaver Lodge. Looking for walleyes and some northerns.

I have never fished Grace lake but the Gawley's are great people to deal with. I know some guys who fished Pusher and Upper Wapesi and did very well on eyes. My groups best was on Bertrand lake, 6 guys for the week..1,742 walleyes in the boats. Terry
